message:
SYSTEM: Jmora20100527.pdf: Página 11
IntraDB planning
• Planning so far decides the sources to query, the 
information to retrieve and the information to use
• A higher granularity is possible and SQL queries 
could be composed using planning
• Planning-by-rewriting should be the planning method 
used, new operators should be added for the 
composition
11
speaker: SYSTEM
